title: Camper font lookalike
content:
I'm looking for a font similar in appearance to the new Camper font by Albert Pereta & Santi Grau

http://www.pomelofoundry.com/camper.html

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422212342im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Camper_font_4502.png)

Any suggestions would be gratefully received,

thanks
author: DerekDooley

comments.content: The closest I can come up with is Big Noodle Titling from Dafont.

Are there any differences between the paid and free versions?

hhp
Many Hrant, Big Noodle is close but not Camper - and only has one weight.

No, Big Noodle is not Camper, but as far as I'm aware Camper is not available to purchase.  
I was hoping to find something a little closer, especially the form of the A and M, but I appreciate you taking time to offer the suggestion.  
thanks

I meant the paid versus free versions of Big Noodle Titling.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/big-noodle-titling/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422212342/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/big-noodle-titling/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/big-noodle-titling/")

BTW:  
- Does MyFonts allow you to give away a font you sell through them (or sell it cheaper)?  
- How easy is it to pull a font off of Dafont? Let's say you decide to start selling it instead of giving it away.

hhp

Hrant, I was not aware of the paid version of Big Noodle and have no idea how it compares to the freeware version. Some people from years ago who started with freeware fonts have updated them for sale by expanding character sets etc. I do not know if this is the case for Big Noodle Titling.
Went & looked -- Big Noodle from dafont is free for personal use only. It would seem any commercial use would require purchase.

BTW Stephen, most ID experts frequent only the ID section, so you should repost your request there.

hhp
Thanks for the tip, will do.
